<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 32&gt;</a> Insts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="#a7bc99de2f3874d014ce70d70c12f3b12">getInsertionRange</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose an insertion point for our new instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;size&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 0, Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstsBefore = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Insts).slice(0, IP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstsAfter = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Insts).slice(IP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose a source, which will be used to constrain the operation selection.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 2&gt;</a> Srcs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  Srcs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IB.findOrCreateSource(BB, InstsBefore));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose an operation that&#39;s constrained to be valid for the type of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// source, collect any other sources it needs, and then build it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpDesc = chooseOperation(Srcs&#91;0&#93;, IB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bail if no operation was found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!OpDesc)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(OpDesc-&gt;SourcePreds).slice(1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    Srcs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IB.findOrCreateSource(BB, InstsBefore, Srcs, Pred));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = OpDesc-&gt;BuilderFunc(Srcs, Insts&#91;IP&#93;-&gt;getIterator())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find a sink and wire up the results of the operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    IB.connectToSink(BB, InstsAfter, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy/#a7af0e4ae5d5b18203ace012d7aa077b6"><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy/#a7af0e4ae5d5b18203ace012d7aa077b6">InstDeleterIRStrategy::getWeight</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurrentSize, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxSize,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have less than 200 bytes, panic and try to always delete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrentSize &gt; MaxSize - 200)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurrentWeight ? CurrentWeight &#42; 100 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Draw a line starting from when we only have 1k left and increasing linearly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to double the current weight.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t Line = (-2 &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">int64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(CurrentWeight)) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">                 (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">int64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MaxSize) -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">int64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(CurrentSize) - 1000) /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">                 1000;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clamp negative weights to zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Line &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Line;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t BitSize = IntTy-&gt;getBitWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t MaxCaseVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">        (BitSize &gt;= 64) ? (uint64&#95;t)-1 : ((uint64&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; BitSize) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create Switch inst in Block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = IB.findOrCreateSource(&#42;Source, InstsBeforeSplit, &#123;&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/fuzzerop/#a8069953a59ba2891578b351ccf2a6bf3">fuzzerop::onlyType</a>(IntTy), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DefaultBlock = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SW&#95;D&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t NumCases = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 1, MaxNumCases);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumCases = (NumCases &gt; MaxCaseVal) ? MaxCaseVal + 1 : NumCases;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> &#42;Switch = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst/#a3c1416226bed5e92acb74aebe8e20f5a">SwitchInst::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, DefaultBlock, NumCases);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove the old terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a016a85f7487f995fe80141e102a7a5ae">ReplaceInstWithInst</a>(Source-&gt;getTerminator(), Switch);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create blocks, for each block assign a case value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Blocks(&#123;DefaultBlock&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;uint64&#95;t, 4&gt;</a> CasesTaken;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; NumCases; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t CaseVal = <a href="#ad84119ef27970279d969c50b73d8d62b">getUniqueCaseValue</a>(CasesTaken, MaxCaseVal, IB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CaseBlock = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SW&#95;C&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;OnValue = ConstantInt::get(IntTy, CaseVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">      Switch-&gt;addCase(OnValue, CaseBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">      Blocks.push&#95;back(CaseBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Connect these blocks to &#96;Sink&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    connectBlocksToSink(Blocks, Sink, IB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The caller has to guarantee that these blocks are &quot;empty&quot;, i.e. it doesn&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="comment">/// even have terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InsertCFGStrategy::connectBlocksToSink(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Blocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Sink,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder">RandomIRBuilder</a> &amp;IB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t DirectSinkIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 0, Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have at least one block that directly goes to sink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    CFGToSink ToSink = (i == DirectSinkIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">                           ? CFGToSink::DirectSink</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">                           : static&#95;cast&lt;CFGToSink&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform</a>&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 IB.Rand, 0, CFGToSink::EndOfCFGToLink - 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = Blocks&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ToSink) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CFGToSink::Return: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;RetTy = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getReturnType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RetValue = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RetTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ae8eaa0b4eeac52a2b2282cb1bfd981ae">isVoidTy</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">        RetValue =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">            IB.findOrCreateSource(&#42;BB, &#123;&#125;, &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/fuzzerop/#a8069953a59ba2891578b351ccf2a6bf3">fuzzerop::onlyType</a>(RetTy));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/returninst/#a932710d4c1c965497707751eb4f7948f">ReturnInst::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, RetValue, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CFGToSink::DirectSink: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a9f40e42226cee617c16cb1c447b115c5">BranchInst::Create</a>(Sink, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CFGToSink::SinkOrSelfLoop: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">      SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt; Branches(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac96f30ba8b117dbd380b88ab8a03732ba1e82b710efc2f25cc275e53b3833e6fa">Sink</a>, BB&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A coin decides which block is true branch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t coin = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64packey/#abf4394f452bde3f544999858d71e4b46a438dbcc76b79fb10acb447ec5d141287">IB</a>.Rand, 0, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64packey/#abf4394f452bde3f544999858d71e4b46a438dbcc76b79fb10acb447ec5d141287">IB</a>.findOrCreateSource(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#42;BB, &#123;&#125;, &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/fuzzerop/#a8069953a59ba2891578b351ccf2a6bf3">fuzzerop::onlyType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#aa75984a442f2379de0c66018201fa628">Type::getInt1Ty</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>)), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a9f40e42226cee617c16cb1c447b115c5">BranchInst::Create</a>(Branches&#91;coin&#93;, Branches&#91;1 - coin&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CFGToSink::EndOfCFGToLink:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;EndOfCFGToLink executed, something&#39;s wrong.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy/#a55f9b306ebb441abea69179650c2a4ad"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy/#a55f9b306ebb441abea69179650c2a4ad">InsertPHIStrategy::mutate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/randomirbuilder">RandomIRBuilder</a> &amp;IB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t insert PHI node to entry node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&amp;BB == &amp;BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a169f0c26ef46161741fdd120a806f853">getEntryBlock</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = IB.randomType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#af4aba918a76ca15bde1be3e14572e475">PHINode::Create</a>(Ty, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f211484edf604716a6c80030b0a0375">llvm::pred&#95;size</a>(&amp;BB), </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a map to make sure the same incoming basic block has the same value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</a> IncomingValues;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(&amp;BB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src = IncomingValues&#91;Pred&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If &#96;Pred&#96; is not in the map yet, we&#39;ll get a nullptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Src) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 32&gt;</a> Insts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Pred-&gt;begin(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != Pred-&gt;end(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">        Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is no need to inform IB what previously used values are if we are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// using &#96;onlyType&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      Src = IB.findOrCreateSource(&#42;Pred, Insts, &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/fuzzerop/#a8069953a59ba2891578b351ccf2a6bf3">fuzzerop::onlyType</a>(Ty));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">      IncomingValues&#91;Pred&#93; = Src;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>-&gt;addIncoming(Src, Pred);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 32&gt;</a> InstsAfter;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose an Instruction to mutate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Idx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af2a9add76255a5e6dc09b1a5f9505f21">uniform&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand, 0, Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst = Insts&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;Idx + 1&#96; so we don&#39;t sink to ourselves.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstsAfter = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Insts).slice(Idx + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t sink terminators, void function calls, token, etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Ty-&gt;isVoidTy() &amp;&amp; !Ty-&gt;isTokenTy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find a new sink and wire up the results of the operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">    IB.connectToSink(BB, InstsAfter, Inst);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A deterministic alternative to SmallPtrSet with the same lookup</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InsertIdx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d2cdc4a0db233678e7141c9d6ea3419">make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">           BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a161fd4e9fa5367f64c2a4c9e921c3ad3">getFirstInsertionPt</a>(), BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>()))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First gather all instructions that can be shuffled. Don&#39;t take</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">    AliveInstsLookup.insert(&#123;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, InsertIdx++&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then remove these instructions from the block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.removeFromParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shuffle these instructions using topological sort.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns false if all current instruction&#39;s dependencies in this block have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// been shuffled. If so, this instruction can be shuffled too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hasAliveParent = &#91;&amp;AliveInsts, &amp;AliveInstsLookup&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;O : AliveInsts&#91;Index&#93;-&gt;operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(O);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get all alive instructions that depend on the current instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;size&#95;t, 8&gt;</a> RootIndices;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Topological sort by randomly selecting a node without a parent, or root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RootIndices.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a34384400167eb6ebf71fa89d98ba03bc">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6695fbc0cb8edb5aede4af74f2ef95d0">makeSampler&lt;size&#95;t&gt;</a>(IB.Rand);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RootIdx : RootIndices)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">      RS.sample(RootIdx, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RootIdx = RS.getSelection();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">    RootIndices.erase(RootIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Root = AliveInsts&#91;RootIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    AliveInsts.erase(RootIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">    AliveInstsLookup.erase(Root);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">    Insts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Root);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Child : getAliveChildren(Root)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then put instructions back.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Insts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;insertBefore(Terminator-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39aacf94d621d7c81b663f33629fc839"><Highlight kind="normal">std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39aacf94d621d7c81b663f33629fc839">llvm::parseModule</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint8&#95;t &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Context) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt;= 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
